errors.evidence: Span 9c37e0915c7cc0a7 (get_examples_to_answer) returned an example with "true_answer": "22" (steps show 2017 - 1995 = 22). Despite that, span 54d1afacaf618262 (CodeAgent.run) shows an output.value of "30" and subsequent execution final_answer(30) was emitted.
errors.description: The agent ignored or misinterpreted the tool output (the provided example/ground-truth of 22) and produced a conflicting value (30). The correct behavior would have been to incorporate the example's true_answer (22) or explicitly justify why a different verified result (30) was used after additional retrieval/verification.

errors.evidence: The assistant states in an LLM output: "I recall that Girls Who Code published a statistic... over a span of three decades ... it took 30 years" without citing a retrieved source or tool result; this assertion conflicts with the example's provided true_answer of 22.
errors.description: The model made an unsupported factual claim (recalling a 30-year duration) without verification and contrary to available in-trace data. This is a language-only hallucination: asserting facts not grounded in the trace's provided evidence or in a tool output.

errors.evidence: The plan (earlier spans) specifies using the search_agent to locate the Girls Who Code source, but instead the execution produced a direct final_answer(30) without calling the search_agent or other retrieval tools. The final tool call is observed at span bb229d14187d5098 with args [30].
errors.description: Although the plan required web/search verification, the agent did not invoke the designated external search/team member tools and instead relied on internal recall and a direct final_answer tool call. This is a poor tool selection/usage decision that bypassed necessary verification steps.

errors.evidence: An earlier span (9c37e0915c7cc0a7) provided a concrete example and a computed year difference (2017 - 1995 = 22) with "true_answer": "22". The agent's later outputs do not reference or reconcile this in-trace context and instead produce 30 as the duration.
errors.description: The agent failed to correctly track and use important context available in the trace (the provided example and its true_answer). It effectively forgot or ignored relevant in-context information that should have influenced the final answer.

scores.reliability_reasoning: The system produced an incorrect final answer (30) that contradicts an explicit in-trace example (true_answer 22) and did so without evidence of verification. This undermines reliability.
scores.security_reasoning: No security or privacy issues, unsafe actions, or sensitive-data exposures were observed in the trace.
scores.instruction_adherence_reasoning: The agent followed some procedural instructions (it produced plans and used the final_answer tool) but failed to adhere to its own plan's verification step (did not use the search_agent) and did not incorporate available example context, reducing adherence.
scores.plan_opt_reasoning: The plan described appropriate verification steps (use search_agent, extract years, compute difference) but execution skipped verification and relied on unverified recall, making the plan execution suboptimal.
